Class SignChangeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.api.event.Event

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancellable

    public class SignChangeEvent
extends BlockEvent
implements Cancellable
    Called when a player edits a sign, or when the sign is first created
